table.name: vtiger_streetline
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_streetline` ( `streetlineid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `streetline_no` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `assesment_no` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fullname` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`streetlineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_streetlinecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_streetlinecf` ( `streetlineid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`streetlineid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
